John E. Charles Accountant

B. Bus (Acct), Registered Tax Agent

About

I'm a Registered Tax Agent with the Tax Practitioner's Board and have been practising for more than 30 years.

When I wasn't working with my clients, I was developing the next generation of Accounting professionals as a Lecturer in Tax and Accounting at Victoria University and Footscray Tafe.

Services

Personal Tax Returns are my passion and a specialty, but I can also help you with BAS Lodgements, ABN Registrations, Rental Property Returns, Partnership Returns and Company Returns.

Why Choose John E. Charles Accountant?

Transparent

My fees are always transparent and are listed right on my website as fixed-pricing based on the services provided. This means you always know in advance exactly what you will be charged and don't have to worry about being hit with unexpected hidden costs.

Experienced

I'm a Registered Tax Agent with the Tax Practitioner's Board and have been practising for more than 30 years. When I wasn't working with my clients, I was developing the next generation of Accounting professionals as a Lecturer in Tax and Accounting at Victoria University and Footscray Tafe.

Invested in You

I care about you and believe in taking the time to get to know you and learn about your unique circumstances. What's important to you is important to me, and I want to make sure we come up with a solution that specifically works for you.
